page.title: 09SOUTHSEA CARNIVAL
page.content: The{carnival}in Southsea is held each summer and is organised by the {Portsmouth Lions club}and Portsmouth North{Rotary club.}It is held to raise money for all different charities and also for the fun of residents and visitors.The route is from the Royal Marine Barracks, along the sea front to the common by{Southsea Castle. Many people take part including business groups, amateurs and clubs like the Royal Marines Cadets Corps.There are floats,bands, sidewalkers and a Carnival Queen. Cups are awarded fot the best floats and the Lord Mayor and Lady Mayoress help to judge these. The people who take part choose a theme and design their own costumes. The Carnival s an exciting event each summer.
